title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Problem-Solving Process Using the Delphi Technique

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and science education experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically perform instructional design problem-solving processes by applying the Delphi technique
Learners can select core strategies from 61 heuristics aligned with IBSTPI competency standards and apply them to actual projects
Learners can solve science education design problems in a project-based learning (PBL) environment and verify results through summative evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
